CREATE TABLE `ims_lxy_signin_record` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) NOT NULL, `from_user` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `time` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '签到时间', `rank` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '排名', `continuedays` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `continuefirst` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `weid` (`weid`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=66 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
-- ---------------------------- -- Table structure for ims_lxy_signin_reply -- ---------------------------- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_lxy_signin_reply`; CREATE TABLE `ims_lxy_signin_reply` ( `id` int(123) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(123) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `overtime` text NOT NULL COMMENT '超出时间段提示', `overnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `awardrules` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `awardinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `days` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
